backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing integration of a newly uploaded image into the Photos section.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for various frontend components and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining CSS variables for light/dark themes and applying global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component assembling all page sections including hero, services, photos, contact, and footer.
Mobile-only sticky call bar that appears after scrolling and links to the emergency phone number.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section showing phone info, service hours, location, emergency details, and reasons to choose the service.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying company info, quick contact details, services list, and copyright notice.
frontend/src/components/HeaderNav.tsx: Fixed navigation bar with scroll-based styling, section scrolling, desktop links, and a mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section with background image, headline, CTAs, and quick info cards promoting towing services.
frontend/src/components/PhotosSection.ts: Renders a photos section showing three towing-related images inside Card components. Includes a grid layout and hover zoom effect.
frontend/src/components/ServiceAreaSecti: Displays service coverage information for Nellore with a list of areas and a contact link. Uses Cards, icons, and a custom Phone SVG component.
Shows a grid of towing services with icons, titles, and descriptions, plus a 24/7 assistance call-to-action. Uses Card components and a Phone SVG icon.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity using React Query. Automatically refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context with login, logout, status tracking, and identity persistence. Wraps app components to provide identity access.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables for the site's color system and layout utilities. Adds shared section layout and typography classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider. Loads global styles and renders App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and design tokens tied to CSS variables.
project_state.json: Describes the project's current state, features, and pending requests for PMK Towing Service website development.
